feed.title: Pinchflat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Housekeeping] Improved robustness of metadata parsing by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/225
  • [Enhancement] Add "Copy JSON" action button to help when troubleshooting by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/224
  • [Enhancement] Add test button to Apprise server input by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/226

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.16...v0.1.17

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Add history table to homepage (And TZ support) by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/229
  • IMPORTANT: you can now set a TZ environment var to make values in this table show up in your local time. See installation section in README for more
  • [Housekeeping] Reduce Docker image size by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/231
  • [Housekeeping] Fix logo flicker between page loads by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/233
  • [Misc.] Direct donations directly to the EFF by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/235

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.17...v0.1.18

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.5.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Make timezone data location user-configurable by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/238
  • [Enhancement] Allow redownloading of files for existing media items by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/239
  • NOTE: This is more handy than it may seem! Check out https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/239 for more info

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.18...v2024.5.14

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.5.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix] Order RSS feed by upload date by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/241
  • [Enhancement] Adds in-app diagnostics page by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/243
  • [Housekeeping] Improved logging for all executable calls by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/244
  • [Enhancement] Support yt-dlp caching by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/245

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.5.14...v2024.5.15

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.5.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix] Fix yt-dlp illegal write issue that causes failure to fetch source details by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/247
  • [Typo] Fix spelling on app info page by @drewstopherlee in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/248

New Contributors

  • @drewstopherlee made their first contribution in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/248

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.5.15...v2024.5.16
